docs.title: Promptly API Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to the Promptly API documentation. Promptly is a generative AI SaaS platform that helps developers integrate advanced text, image, and speech generation into their applications with minimal setup.

docs.title: What You Can Do with Promptly
docs.text:
• Generate human-like text for chatbots, content, and summarization.
  • Create images dynamically from text prompts.
  • Convert text to speech for natural-sounding voices.
  • Manage subscriptions, track usage, and monitor API performance.

docs.title: API Architecture
docs.text:
For a high-level overview of how Promptly processes requests, see the architecture diagram:

flowchart TD
    subgraph Client
        A[User / App]
    end

    subgraph Promptly API
        B[Text Generation]
        C[Image Generation]
        D[Speech Generation]
        E[Usage Tracking & Subscription Management]
    end

    subgraph Backend Services
        F[Authentication Service]
        G[Billing Service]
        H[Data Storage]
    end

    A -->|API Requests| F
    F -->|Validate API Key| B
    F -->|Validate API Key| C
    F -->|Validate API Key| D
    B --> H
    C --> H
    D --> H
    B --> A
    C --> A
    D --> A
    A -->|Check usage / subscription| E
    E --> G
    E --> H

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text:
All requests require an API key. You can create and manage keys from your Promptly Dashboard.

Authentication is handled via Bearer tokens in the Authorization header:

Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY

Example using curl:

curl -X POST "https://api.promptly.ai/v1/text/generate" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "prompt": "Write a motivational quote about innovation."
  }'

docs.title: Authentication Flow
docs.text:
For a visual of how API key validation works:

sequenceDiagram
    participant U as User
    participant A as Promptly API
    participant S as Auth Server

    U->>A: Send API Key
    A->>S: Validate API Key
    S-->>A: Validation Result (200 OK / 401 Unauthorized)
    A-->>U: Response

docs.title: Quick Start Guide
docs.text: Get up and running with the Promptly API in just a few steps.

docs.title: Step 1: Install Dependencies
docs.text:
Make sure you have Python 3.7+ installed, then install requests:

pip install requests

Tip: You can also use curl or any HTTP client if you prefer not to use Python.

docs.title: Step 2: Create an Account and Get Your API Key
docs.text:
Sign up at https://promptly.ai/signup

Keep your API key secure! Never commit it to public repositories.

docs.title: Step 3: Generate Text
docs.text:
Use the /v1/generate/text endpoint to gen

import requests

# Endpoint and headers
url = "https://api.promptly.ai/v1/generate/text"
headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_API_KEY",
    "Content-Type": "application/json"
}

# Request payload
data = {
    "model": "promptly-gpt-3",
    "prompt": "Write a haiku about AI",
    "max_tokens": 50
}

# Send request
resp = requests.post(url, headers=headers, json=data)
print(resp.json())

docs.title: Example Response
docs.text:
{
  "id": "txt-001",
  "text": "Machines learn and grow,\nSilent algorithms hum,\nWisdom blooms in code."
}

Tip: Adjust max_tokens to control the length of the generated text.

Great! You've successfully generated your first piece of text. 🎉

To explore other capabilities, check out the Image Generation and Speech Generation sections.

docs.title: Usage Tracking
docs.text: Monitor your API usage, limits, and quotas to ensure you stay within your subscription plan.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text: GET /v1/usage

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text:
Bearer token in Authorization header:

Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY
Content-Type: application/json

docs.title: Example Request
docs.text:
curl -X GET "https://api.promptly.ai/v1/usage" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY"

docs.title: Example Response
docs.text:
{
  "period": "2025-09-01 to 2025-09-20",
  "text_generation": {
    "used": 1200,
    "limit": 5000
  },
  "image_generation": {
    "used": 30,
    "limit": 100
  },
  "speech_generation": {
    "used": 50,
    "limit": 200
  }
}

docs.title: Rate Limits and Quotas
docs.text:
Endpoint Limit per Minute Daily Quota Text Generation 60 5000 Image Generation 10 100 Speech Generation 20 200

For visual reference of how usage tracking works, see the API Architecture Diagram.

docs.title: Subscription Overview
docs.text: Understand your account subscription, billing, and plan limits.

docs.title: Subscription Tiers
docs.text: Plan Monthly Cost Text Gen Image Gen Speech Gen Free $0 500 5 20 Pro $29 5000 100 200 Enterprise Custom Unlimited Unlimited Unlimited

docs.title: Create a Subscription
docs.text:
curl -X POST "https://api.promptly.ai/v1/subscriptions" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "plan": "Pro"
  }'

docs.title: List Subscriptions
docs.text:
curl -X GET "https://api.promptly.ai/v1/subscriptions" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY"

docs.title: Cancel Subscription
docs.text:
curl -X DELETE "https://api.promptly.ai/v1/subscriptions/sub-001" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY"

docs.title: Usage Flow Diagram
docs.text:
The following sequence diagram illustrates how usage tracking and subscription updates propagate through the system:

sequenceDiagram
    participant U as User
    participant A as Promptly API
    participant B as Billing Service
    participant D as Data Storage

    U->>A: Create / Update / Cancel Subscription
    A->>B: Process Payment / Refund
    B-->>A: Payment Status
    A->>D: Update Subscription Record
    D-->>A: Confirmation
    A-->>U: Subscription Status Updated

docs.title: Notes
docs.text:
• Usage data is updated in near real-time.
  • Exceeding quotas will return 429 Too Many Requests.
  • Subscription changes take effect immediately for new billing cycles.
  • Always include your API key in requests to track usage correctly.

docs.title: Image Generation API
docs.text: Generate images dynamically from text prompts.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text: POST /v1/image/generate

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text:
All requests require a Bearer token in the Authorization header.

Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY
Content-Type: application/json

docs.title: Request Body
docs.text:
{
  "prompt": "A futuristic cityscape at sunset",
  "width": 1024,
  "height": 1024,
  "num_images": 1
}

docs.title: Response
docs.text:
{
  "id": "img-456",
  "object": "image_generation",
  "images": [
    "https://cdn.promptly.ai/images/img-456.png"
  ]
}

docs.title: Errors
docs.text:
• 401 Unauthorized → Invalid API key
  • 429 Too Many Requests → Rate limit exceeded
  • 400 Bad Request → Invalid parameters

docs.title: Speech Generation API
docs.text: Convert text into natural-sounding speech.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text: POST /v1/speech/generate

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text:
All requests require a Bearer token in the Authorization header.

Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY
Content-Type: application/json

docs.title: Request Body
docs.text:
{
  "text": "Welcome to Promptly API!",
  "voice": "alloy",
  "format": "mp3"
}

docs.title: Response
docs.text:
{
  "id": "sp-789",
  "object": "speech_generation",
  "audio_url": "https://cdn.promptly.ai/audio/sp-789.mp3"
}

docs.title: Errors
docs.text:
• 401 Unauthorized → Invalid API key
  • 429 Too Many Requests → Rate limit exceeded
  • 400 Bad Request → Invalid parameters

docs.title: Subscriptions API
docs.text: Manage and monitor subscriptions for your account.

docs.title: Endpoints
docs.text:
• GET /v1/subscriptions → List all subscriptions
  • POST /v1/subscriptions → Create a new subscription
  • DELETE /v1/subscriptions/{id} → Cancel a subscription

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text:
All requests require a Bearer token in the Authorization header.

Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY
Content-Type: application/json

docs.title: Example: List Subscriptions
docs.text:
curl -X GET "https://api.promptly.ai/v1/subscriptions" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY"

docs.title: Example Response
docs.text:
{
  "subscriptions": [
    {
      "id": "sub-001",
      "plan": "Pro",
      "status": "active",
      "start_date": "2025-09-20"
    }
  ]
}

docs.title: Errors
docs.text:
• 401 Unauthorized → Invalid API key
  • 429 Too Many Requests → Rate limit exceeded
  • 404 Not Found → Subscription ID does not exist

docs.title: Text Generation API
docs.text: Generate human-like text based on prompts.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text: POST /v1/text/generate

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text:
All requests require a Bearer token in the Authorization header.

Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY
Content-Type: application/json

docs.title: Request Body
docs.text:
{
  "prompt": "Write a motivational quote about innovation.",
  "max_tokens": 100,
  "temperature": 0.7
}

docs.title: Response
docs.text:
{
  "id": "txt-123",
  "object": "text_completion",
  "output": "Innovation is the art of turning ideas into reality..."
}

docs.title: Errors
docs.text:
• 401 Unauthorized → Invalid API key
  • 429 Too Many Requests → Rate limit exceeded
